revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=RED |revision=10 Rev. 3 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (11/01/2018) |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP435;NHIXP435AC |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128-P30TF75 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A DDR Termination Regulator;Analog Integrations Corp;AIC1385;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Analog Integrations Corp;AIC1526;;1;,,, Transient Voltage Suppressing Device;Amazing Microelectronic Corp;AZ3028-04P;;5;,,, Low Capacitance ESD Protection Array;Amazing Microelectronic Corp;AZC099-04S;5; |flags=metal case |oui_eth=00:1A:8C }} {{TagLine|Sophos RED 10}} :[https://support.sophos.com/support/s/article/KB-000036699?language=en_US#Basic-setup-instructions Support] "IXP_B_110617_V10.3" is silkscreened on the board. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel XScale]]'' IXP435 ARM (@400MHz) *Memory: 128MB (DRAM) DDR *Storage: 16MB Flash *Network: 5x Fast Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:Sophos RED 10 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos RED 10 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
